name: Jupiteration
description: Jupiteration is a Sci-Fi shooter game designed for virtual reality headset HTC Vive & Oculus Rift + Touch
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel i5 2400 or similar AMD CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 980 or AMD R9 FURY DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel i7 3770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
